messages.title: Tessa for real change
messages.content: Local campaigner Tessa Munt has earned her reputation as passionate, energetic and tenacious in representing local people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tessa and the Lib Dems want every child to have the best possible start in life, so we'll invest in education that's enriching, diverse and open to all in Somerset.

mentions.candidate: Local campaigner Tessa Munt has earned her reputation as passionate, energetic and tenacious in representing local people.
mentions.tacticalSituation: It’s so close here. If just 1,521 people switch to Tessa, we could have a REAL change here.

issues.education: Tessa and the Lib Dems want every child to have the best possible start in life, so we'll invest in education that's enriching, diverse and open to all in Somerset.

politicalExperience.achievements: Tessa’s 17 years knocking on doors, speaking to nearly 48,000 local people and leading key campaigns – like saving Street’s Post Office and achieving Outstanding 'Beautiful Burham' and Strode College improvements.

quotes.text: I contacted the MP... and had to badger his office... I wrote to Tessa... she came, had a look, took some pictures, argued with the council on my behalf and bingo the fence was repaired.
